title: Northern Territory Contact. No. 12
creator_credit: Ian Walker, Malcolm Otton and Film Australia
brief_description: Solar village. In the little township of Nguiu, on Bathurst Island a solar power plant run by First Nations people, has been built, which supplies electricity to the settlement of 800 people.
